inclusion.criterion: Subject has severity/stage of disease: at least 12 voids/day with the presence of pelvic pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to follow study instructions and likely to complete all required visits.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine pregnancy test on the day of treatment prior to the administration of study medication (for females of childbearing potential; if applicable)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any medications that might interfere with neuromuscular function
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Females who are pregnant, breast-feeding, or planning a pregnancy during the study or who think that they may be pregnant at the start of the study, or females of childbearing potential who are unable or unwilling to use a reliable form of contraception during the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy or sensitivity to any of the components in the study medication
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent participation in another investigational drug or device study, or participation in the 30 days immediately prior to study enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting. Abdominal CT scan revealed acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis with enlarged common bile duct and intrahepatic duct confirming gall stone pancreatitis.
